title: Scream's Hidden Message: Victimhood is Deadly

media:group.media:title: Scream's Hidden Message: Victimhood is Deadly
media:group.media:description:
The masked-horror-slasher sensation “Scream” is one of the most beloved films of its genre, and for good reason: suspense, intrigue, “innocence”, and plenty of blood. However, a less obvious reason to admire the film is its devious depiction of toxic victimhood.
——————————
CREDITS: 
Written by Jon Miltimore & Sean W. Malone
Narrated by Matt Tabor
Produced and Edited by Michael Ozias
Assistant Edited by Abby Richardson
